name: what's mine is not yours (splitting the assets in a divorce)
name_original: what's mine is not yours (splitting the assets in a divorce)
description:
a two-player game but can be played as a single player

super quick -> under 10 minutes but if you role play it i expect it would be very fun and last longer

you want your ex to walk away from the divorce with as few of the assets they care about and you do this by calling dibs on them first

creative consultant: "that bitch i live with" (quoted)

game icons from https://game-icons.net/
